title: GUERRILLA cap
content:
Hello Ladies and Gentlemans, I'm 17 years old and I from Brazil. I'm a typomaniac =)   
But now I have a problem. I want know what is the typeface used in this cap , because i'll make a identic cap for me =).I'm sorry for the english errors.   
thanks a lot! ![the cap](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804110432im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/6852.jpg)

 [‹ (x) SimonLadenFogged site - DIN {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804110432/http:/typophile.com/node/10166 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) I'VE GOT A FEELING - Beta Sans {Peter Bruhn} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804110432/http:/typophile.com/node/9907 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: This has a hatted 'A' but you might like [Clarendon Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804110432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/bold-condensed/testdrive.html?s=GUERRILLA&p=48&refby=typographica).

I can't find it, either, but the E is more like Century Old Style or Bookman, but with the wrong serifs. This isn't it, but see if you like [Beton Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804110432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/beton/t-bold-condensed/testdrive.html?s=GUERRILLA&p=48).
